Hello! I'm Katie.


Cartographer, glasses-wearer, and amateur cheese enthusiast.

I love making, talking, and thinking about maps. Cartographer turned front end web developer, I'm always looking to learn something new. As of late, I've been working & hanging out in the UW-Madison Cartography Lab dreaming up ways to teach people about maps, building things, and experimenting some.

I spread my passion for maps with the crowds at Maptime!, NACIS, and Girls Who Code. I love living at the intersection of design, programming, and science and couldn't imagine it any other way.

Let's get in touch:
